languages.text: "А вы слышали, сына лорда Эвери приговорили к тридцати годам каторги?!"
"Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"
languages.original_text: "А вы слышали, сына лорда Эвери приговорили к тридцати годам каторги?!"

traits.locale_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"
"Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"
"Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"
"Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"
"Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

languages.text: "Habt Ihr es schon gehört? Der Sohn von Lord Avery wurde zu dreißig Jahren harter Arbeit verurteilt!"
languages.original_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr es schon gehört? Der Sohn von Lord Avery wurde zu dreißig Jahren harter Arbeit verurteilt!"

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu la dernière ? Le fils du seigneur Avery a été condamné à trente ans de travaux forcés ! »
languages.original_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu la dernière ? Le fils du seigneur Avery a été condamné à trente ans de travaux forcés ! »

languages.text: “你听说了吗？艾弗里勋爵的儿子被判了三十年苦役！”
languages.original_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

traits.locale_text: “你听说了吗？艾弗里勋爵的儿子被判了三十年苦役！”

languages.text: «¿Has oído? ¡Han sentenciado al hijo de lord Avery a treinta años de trabajos forzados!».
languages.original_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Has oído? ¡Han sentenciado al hijo de lord Avery a treinta años de trabajos forzados!».

languages.text: 「聞いたか？エイブリー卿の息子が、30年の重労働を言い渡されたそうだ！」
languages.original_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

traits.locale_text: 「聞いたか？エイブリー卿の息子が、30年の重労働を言い渡されたそうだ！」

languages.text: "Duydun mu? Lord Avery'nin oğlu, otuz yıl ağır iş cezasına çarptırılmış!"
languages.original_text: "Did you hear? Lord Avery's son has been sentenced to thirty years of hard labour!"

traits.locale_text: "Duydun mu? Lord Avery'nin oğlu otuz yıl ağır iş cezasına çarptırılmış!"
